author: aterrell
title: ‘My job is to make 100 per cent people happy’ – Arsene Wenger tells of heartache over ‘Wenger Out’ plane banner at West Brom
text:
EFL Arsene Vaguer ‘My job is to make 100 per cent people happy’– Arsene Wenger tells of heartache over ‘Wenger Out’ plane banner at West Brom 
Frenchman has again been vague over his new deal as he dithers on making a firm decision public By Alex Terrell 22nd March 2017, 2:49 pm Updated: 22nd March 2017, 3:05 pm
